dcterms:description: The CzechHWR dataset consists of triplets: a text line image, a Writer Style Identifier (WSI), and the annotation of the text line image. It was created from three main sources: an OCR web application, a collection of Czech letters, and Czech chronicles. The dataset contains approximately 406k annotated text line images with 5.1k WSIs, primarily written in Czech modern cursive script, along with some documents in Gothic or German Kurrent scripts.
dcterms:title: CzechHWR Dataset
